hero.name: Vaishnav H
hero.subtitle: Founder, Chairman & CEO - SCIFY Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
hero.description: I see opportunities where others see uncertainty. As a strategist and founder, I bring clarity to complex problems and guide teams toward disciplined execution. I believe real leadership is not just about building companies ,  it’s about shaping capable founders

about.lead: I started SCIFY Technologies to work on real problems in sustainability and infrastructure. We focus on R&D that actually gets built and used.
about.main: Beyond running the company, I mentor students at IEEE and IEDC programs, helping them move from ideas to execution. I've spoken at multiple events about building startups from college and making technical projects work in the real world.
about.skills: R&D, Product Development, Sustainability, EV Systems, Mentorship, Public Speaking

work.title: KTU Innovation Grant
work.subtitle: Project Hydra
work.description: Won ₹2 lakh from KTU for developing a Plastic & water management system. Used it to validate the tech and build a working prototype.
work.tags: R&D, Water Tech, plastic recycling, sustainability.

work.title: KREEPA Expo
work.subtitle: EV TECH
work.description: Won first place at South India's largest renewable energy expo

work.title: PROJECT SHIELD
work.description: Built an EV battery safety system. Won first prize and ₹40,000

work.title: IEDC NEST
work.description: Selected for IEDC's innovation network. Mentor startups and run workshops

work.title: IIT Palakkad
work.subtitle: Business Development Intern
work.description: Worked on commercializing research at SATCARD Association. Built business models for tech products.

speaking.title: IEEE AKIASSC 2025
speaking.description: Spoke to students about building startups from college. Shared real experiences from running SCIFY and what actually works vs what sounds good.
speaking.topics: Starting Up, Handling Failure, Building Teams, Getting Things Done

speaking.title: IEEE Events
speaking.description: Regular speaker at IEEE forums on moving from college projects to real products

speaking.title: IEDC UKFCET
speaking.description: Bootcamp speaker on building startups while still in college

speaking.title: IEDC Programs
speaking.description: Run workshops and mentor student founders at IEDC events

testimonials.text: Vaishnav's session at IEEE was eye-opening. He didn't just talk theory - he shared real failures and wins from building SCIFY. That honesty is rare.
testimonials.author: Student Attendee

testimonials.text: His mentorship helped us move from a college project to something investors actually wanted to see. He's practical, not preachy.
testimonials.author: Startup Founder

testimonials.text: Working with Vaishnav at IIT Palakkad showed me how R&D actually becomes business. He bridges that gap really well.
testimonials.author: Colleague

testimonials.text: What impressed me most is how he aligns research with commercial viability. That’s a rare skill.
testimonials.author: Nikhil Krishnan

faq.question: What does SCIFY Technologies do?
faq.answer: We build R&D solutions for sustainability and infrastructure challenges. Focus is on making tech that actually gets used, not just prototypes that sit on shelves.

faq.question: Are you available for speaking events?
faq.answer: Yes. I speak at college events, IEEE chapters, and startup bootcamps. Topics include startup building, R&D commercialization, and student entrepreneurship. Email me with event details.

faq.question: Do you mentor individual founders?
faq.answer: I mentor through IEDC programs and occasionally take on individual mentees. Best fit is student founders working on technical products. Reach out with what you're building.

faq.question: What kind of projects are you open to?
faq.answer: Sustainability, clean energy, infrastructure tech, and EV systems. Interested in partnerships where we can bring R&D expertise and execution capability.

faq.question: How can I work with SCIFY?
faq.answer: We're open to consulting projects, research collaborations, and partnerships. Email with your project details and we'll see if there's a fit.
